attributes.action: put in place Clinical Guidelines for Lyme disease and Tick-borne diseases in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to put in place Clinical Guidelines, SPECIFIC to the United Kingdom, for the diagnosis and treatment of all patients, including children, who have acquired Lyme disease or associated Tick-borne diseases.  These guidelines should be part of a national strategy to combat this increasingly common threat to health in the United Kingdom and should address the UK presentation of Lyme disease and other emerging Tick-borne Diseases.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "put in place Clinical Guidelines for Lyme disease and Tick-borne diseases in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19583


Prime Minister's Office
